name: Computer Science & Engineering
description: The Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) was established in 1988. Currently, the department offers a 4-year undergraduate program B.E in Computer Science & Engineering (BCSE), 2-year postgraduate program M.E in Computer Science & Engineering (MCSE), 2-year MCA program, 3-year postgraduate evening program M.Tech in Computer Technology (MTCT), and PhD programs.
